name: Tooltip
description: Tooltip component for displaying additional information on hover. Provides contextual help or labels for UI elements.

props.name: children
props.description: The element that triggers the tooltip

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the tooltip is shown

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the tooltip is disabled

examples.title: IconButton with Tooltip
examples.description: Tooltip on icon button for accessibility
examples.code:
import { Tooltip, IconButton } from '@/components';
import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete';

<Tooltip title="Delete">
  <IconButton aria-label="Delete">
    <DeleteIcon />
  </IconButton>
</Tooltip>

examples.title: Placement
examples.code:
import { Tooltip, Button } from '@/components';

<Tooltip title="Additional info" placement="right">
  <Button>Hover me</Button>
</Tooltip>

examples.title: Truncated Text
examples.description: Tooltip showing full content for truncated text
examples.code:
import { Tooltip, Typography } from '@mui/material';

<Tooltip title="Full text content here">
  <Typography noWrap sx={{ maxWidth: 100 }}>
    Truncated text...
  </Typography>
</Tooltip>

migrationExamples.designSystem:
import { Tooltip, IconButton } from '@/components';
<Tooltip title="Delete"><IconButton aria-label="Delete"><DeleteIcon /></IconButton></Tooltip>
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Tooltip with design system Tooltip. Add aria-label to IconButton for accessibility.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Escape dismisses tooltip, focus triggers tooltip display
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Tooltip content is announced when the trigger element receives focus

whenNotToUse: For error messages (use form validation instead)
For critical information (it may not be discoverable)
bestPractices: Use enterDelay to prevent flickering on quick mouse moves
commonPatterns: Truncated text with full content tooltip
